good.text: Your restoration and economic decisions were successful, you protected nearby exosystems from further decline and the town is now sustainable.

good_neutral.text: Your decisions were helpful to reduce further decline of ecosystems and delayed effects of rising sea levels

bad_neutral.text: You delayed effects of rising sea levels but ecosystems have seen an unsustainable decline

bad.text: Your decisions gave short term benefits, but long term were unsustainable in saving the town and ecosystems.
